answers.answer: Hi there,You should eat a diet which contains more of green leafy vegetables, fruits and protein and less of spaghetti, potato etc. Cut down on pastas, burgers, sweets, cold drinks.  It is best to eat lots of fruits and non-starchy green veggies, go slow on fats, eat carbohydrates in moderation and increase your protein intake.
